type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.task.TaskFinishEvent
type.description: An event that informs about a task having finished its execution. You can query the result of the task using #getResult(). @since 2.5

method.name: getResult
method.description:
Returns the result of the finished task operation. Currently, the result will be one of the following sub-types:
  • TaskSuccessResult
  • TaskSkippedResult
  • TaskFailureResult


returns:the result of the finished task operation

property.name: result
property.description:
Returns the result of the finished task operation. Currently, the result will be one of the following sub-types:
  • TaskSuccessResult
  • TaskSkippedResult
  • TaskFailureResult


returns:the result of the finished task operation
